events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago, and it still hasn’t arrived. The tracking information hasn’t updated in days, and I’m really frustrated with the delay.
The issue has been identified as a Delivery Delay based on the customer’s report of late shipping and tracking problems.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. who specializes in shipping and delivery concerns.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m sorry to hear your order hasn’t arrived yet. Let me look into this for you.
Could you please provide your order number and the last tracking update you received? This will help me check the shipment status.
Sure, the order number is 987654321, and the last tracking update was from five days ago showing it was at a regional facility.
Thank you for the info. I have contacted the shipping provider and they confirmed a delay due to weather. Your package is now expected to arrive within three business days.
Thanks for the update and clarifying the reason for the delay. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving my order.
I’m glad I could help clarify your delivery status. Please reach out if there are any further delays or issues with your order.
Checking in to confirm your order has arrived and you are satisfied with the resolution. Let us know if you need any further assistance.
Closing this case now as the delivery was completed successfully and customer confirmed satisfaction with the support provided.
